Ability.Name: Initial
Ability.Lua:
if PQR_RotationStarted == true then PQR_RotationStarted = false if PQR_LoadLua ~= nil then if PQR_LoadLua("PQR_ImoCuteOne.lua") == false then PQR_WriteToChat("Put PQR_ImoCuteOne.lua in the data folder.", "Error") PQR_StopRotation() return true end end end
----Announce across the screen---- if not Nova_Notify then Nova_NotifyFrame = nil function Nova_NotifyFrame_OnUpdate() if (Nova_NotifyFrameTime < GetTime() - 5) then local alpha = Nova_NotifyFrame:GetAlpha() if (alpha ~= 0) then Nova_NotifyFrame:SetAlpha(alpha - .02) end if (alpha == 0) then Nova_NotifyFrame:Hide() end end end
-- Debug messages. function Nova_Notify(message) Nova_NotifyFrame.text:SetText(message) Nova_NotifyFrame:SetAlpha(1) Nova_NotifyFrame:Show() Nova_NotifyFrameTime = GetTime() end
-- Debug Notification Frame Nova_NotifyFrame = CreateFrame('Frame') Nova_NotifyFrame:ClearAllPoints() Nova_NotifyFrame:SetHeight(300) Nova_NotifyFrame:SetWidth(300) Nova_NotifyFrame:SetScript('OnUpdate', Nova_NotifyFrame_OnUpdate) Nova_NotifyFrame:Hide() Nova_NotifyFrame.text = Nova_NotifyFrame:CreateFontString(nil, 'BACKGROUND', 'PVPInfoTextFont') Nova_NotifyFrame.text:SetAllPoints() Nova_NotifyFrame:SetPoint('CENTER', 0, 200) Nova_NotifyFrameTime = 0 end
shcom() timecheck() --Dummy 5min DPS Test if UnitExists("target") then if cTime >= 300 and dummy() then StopAttack() ClearTarget() cast(gsi(36936)) print("5 Minute Dummy Test Concluded - Profile Stopped") --PQR_StopRotation() end end
if UnitBuffID("target",117961) then StopAttack() end ------Abilities------ ag = 108281 --Ancestral Guidance as = 2008 --Ancestral Spirit asc = 114049 --Ascendance asw = 16188 --Ancestral Swiftness ar = 556 --Astral Recall ass = 108271 --Astral Shift be = 76780 --Bind Elemental bf = 33697 --Blood Fury (Orc Racial) ch = 1064 --Chain Heal cl = 421 --Chain Lightning cs = 51886 --Cleanse Spirit eb = 117014 --Elemental Blast em = 16166 --Elemental Mastery es = 8042 --Earth Shock gon = 59547 --Gift of the Naaru far = 6196 --Far Sight fer = 51533 --Feral Spirit fn = 1535 --Fire Nova fs = 8050 --Flame Shock frs = 8056 --Frost Shock gw = 2645 --Ghost Wolf hr = 73920 --Healing Rain hs = 8004 --Healing Surge her = 32182 --Heroism hex = 51514 --Hex ll = 60103 --Lava Lash lb = 403 --Lightning Bolt ls = 324 --Lightning Shield ps = 73899 --Primal Strike prg = 370 --Purge sb = 115356 --Stormblast sr = 30823 --Shamanistic Rage sw = 58875 --Spirit Walk sg = 79206 --Spiritwalker's Grace ss = 17364 --Stormstrike tp = 108287 --Totemic Projection tr = 36936 --Totemic Recall ue = 73680 --Unleash Elements uf = 117012 --Unleashed Fury ws = 52127 --Water Shield ww = 546 --Water Walking wsh = 57994 --Wind Shear
------Totems------ ---Air ct = 108269 --Capacitor Totem gt = 8177 --Grounding Totem st = 120668 --Stormlash Totem wt = 108273 --Windwalk Totem --_, air = GetTotemInfo(4) --if air == gsi(ct) or air == gsi(gt) or air == gsi(st) or air == gsi(wt) then -- hasair = true -- atr = GetTotemTimeLeft(4) --else -- hasair = false -- atr = 0 --end
---Earth et = 2484 --Earthbind Totem tt = 8143 --Tremor Totem eet = 2062 --Earth Elemental Totem --_, earth = GetTotemInfo(2) --if earth == gsi(et) or earth == gsi(tt) or earth == gsi(eet) then -- hasearth = true -- etr = GetTotemTimeLeft(2) --else -- hasearth = false -- etr = 0 --end
---Fire fet = 2894 --Fire Elemental Totem mt = 8190 --Magma Totem srt = 3599 --Searing Totem --_, fire = GetTotemInfo(1) --if fire == gsi(fet) or fire == gsi(mt) or fire == gsi(srt) then -- hasfire = true -- ftr = GetTotemTimeLeft(1) --else -- hasfire = false -- ftr = 0 --end
---Water hst = 5394 --Healing Stream Totem --_, water = GetTotemInfo(3) --if water == gsi(hst) then -- haswater = true -- wtr = GetTotemTimeLeft(3) --else -- haswater = false -- wtr = 0 --end hasfire, hasearth, haswater, hasair = false, false, false, false ftr, etr, wtr, atr = 0, 0, 0, 0 pFire = {fet, mt, srt,} pEarth = {et, tt, eet,} pWater = {hst,} pAir = {ct, gt, st, wt,}
fire = select(2, GetTotemInfo(1)) for k=1, #pFire do if gsi(pFire[k]) == fire then hasfire = true ftr = GetTotemTimeLeft(1) break end end earth = select(2, GetTotemInfo(2)) for k=1, #pEarth do if gsi(pEarth[k]) == fire then hasearth = true etr = GetTotemTimeLeft(2) break end end water = select(2, GetTotemInfo(3)) for k=1, #pWater do if gsi(pWater[k]) == fire then haswater = true wtr = GetTotemTimeLeft(3) break end end air = select(2, GetTotemInfo(4)) for k=1, #pAir do if gsi(pAir[k]) == fire then hasair = true atr = GetTotemTimeLeft(4) break end end if not hasfire and not hasair and not hasearth and not haswater and (totemX ~= 0 or totemY ~= 0) then totemX,totemY = 0,0 end
------Weapon Imbues------ local mh, mhr, _, oh, ohr = GetWeaponEnchantInfo() if mh==nil then hasmh = false else hasmh = true end if oh==nil then hasoh = false else hasoh = true end wfw = 8232 --Windfury Weapon ftw = 8024 --Flametongue Weapon fbw = 8033 --Frostbrand Weapon rbw = 8017 --Rockbiter Weapon
------Buffs/Debuffs/Procs------ ufl = 73683 --Unleashed Flame mw = 53817 --Maelstrom Weapon sf = 77657 --Searing Flames ex = 57723 --Exhaustion asb = 114051 --Ascendance Buff mwstack = select(4,ubid(p,mw)) if mwstack == nil then mwc = 0 else mwc = mwstack end
sfstack = select(4,ubid(p,sf)) if sfstack == nil then sfc = 0 else sfc = sfstack end
inMelee = IsSpellInRange(gsi(ll), t) if inMelee == nil or inMelee == 0 then inMelee = false else inMelee = true end
fstimeer = select(4,udbid(t,fs,p)) if fstimer == nil then fsr = 0 else fsr = fstimer end
exhausted = select(4,ubid(p,ex)) if exhausted == nil then nohero = 0 else nohero = exhausted end
if GetSpellBookItemInfo(uf,"SPELL")==nil then hasuf = false else hasuf = true end
------TOGGLES/HOTKEYS------ -- CD Switch if PQ_CDMode==nil then PQ_CDMode = "Boss" end if IsRightControlKeyDown() and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() and GetTime() - PQ_CDTimer > 0.25 then PQ_CDTimer = GetTime()
if not PQ_CD then PQ_CD = CD_BossOnly PQ_CDMode = "Boss" Nova_Notify("|cff347C2CCooldown Mode: |cff79BAECBoss Only|cffffffff") elseif PQ_CD == CD_BossOnly then PQ_CD = CD_Auto PQ_CDMode = "On" Nova_Notify("|cff347C2CCooldown Mode: |cff006400On|cffffffff") else PQ_CD = false PQ_CDMode = "Off" Nova_Notify("|cff347C2CCooldown Mode: |cffDC143COff|cffffffff") end end
-- AoE/Single Switch if AOEMode == nil then AOEMode = 0 end if PQ_Rot == nil then PQ_Rot = "Single" end
if IsRightShiftKeyDown() and not GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() and GetTime() - PQ_AOETimer > 0.25 then PQ_AOETimer = GetTime()
if PQ_AOE then PQ_AOE = false AOEMode = 0 PQ_Rot = "Single" --PQR_SwapRotation("Enhance PvE (CuteOne)") Nova_Notify("|cff347C2CAOE Mode: |cffDC143CSingle|cffffffff") elseif AOEMode==0 then PQ_AOE = false AOEMode = 1 PQ_Rot = "Hybrid" Nova_Notify("|cff347C2CAOE Mode: |cff79BAECHybrid|cffffffff") elseif AOEMode==1 then PQ_AOE = true AOEMode = 2 PQ_Rot = "Multi" Nova_Notify("|cff347C2CAOE Mode: |cff006400Multi|cffffffff") --PQR_SwapRotation("Enhance AoE PvE (CuteOne)") end end
-- PQI Addon: Toggle Status Display PQR_Event("PQR_Text",'CD-Mode: '..PQ_CDMode..' --- '..'AOE-Mode: '..PQ_Rot) --PQR_Event("PQR_Text",'Totem Range= '..totemDistance())
------ETC------ -- Data File Functions --BehindFunc() ttd("target") GroupInfo() SymMem() if UnitExists("target")~=nil then bossID = tonumber(UnitGUID(t):sub(-13, -9), 16) else bossID = 0 end

Ability.Name: Pause
Ability.Lua: if IsLeftAltKeyDown() or IsMounted() or ubid(p,gw) or SpellIsTargeting() or not UnitExists("Target") or UnitBuffID("Player",80169) or UnitBuffID("Player",87959) or UnitBuffID("player",5384) or UnitBuffID("player", 77769) or UnitChannelInfo("Player") or UnitIsDeadOrGhost("Player") or UnitIsDeadOrGhost("Target") or UnitBuffID("target",117961) --Impervious Shield - Qiang the Merciless or UnitDebuffID("player",135147) --Dead Zone - Iron Qon: Dam'ren or UnitBuffID("target",143593) --Defensive Stance - General Nagrazim or UnitBuffID("target",140296) --Conductive Shirld - Thunder Lord / Lightning Guardian or not UnitAffectingCombat("Player") then return true end

Ability.Name: Shield and Weapons
Ability.Lua:
------Shields Up------ if not IsMounted() and plvl >= 8 then if powper>=25 and not ubid(p,ls) and not ubid(p,ws) then cast(gsi(ls)) end if powper < 25 and not ubid(p,ws) and plvl >= 20 then cast(gsi(ws)) end if powper > 75 and ubid(p,ws) then cast(gsi(ls)) end
------Weapons Online-----
if hasmh == false and plvl >= 10 then if plvl < 30 then cast(gsi(ftw), p) else cast(gsi(wfw), p) end end if hasoh == false and plvl >= 10 then cast(gsi(ftw), p) end end

Ability.Name: Totem Management
Ability.Lua:
if plvl>=30 and outcom and (hasfire or hasair or hasearth or haswater) then totemX,totemY = 0,0 cast(gsi(tr)) end if incom and sir(gsi(ll),t)==1 then if AoE == false then if plvl>=16 and hasfire==false and cd(fet) > 0 then totemX,totemY = GetPlayerMapPosition("Player") cast(gsi(srt)) end if plvl>=30 and fire == gsi(mt) or totemDistance() > 17 then totemX,totemY = 0,0 cast(gsi(tr)) end end if AoE == true then if plvl>=36 and hasfire==false then totemX,totemY = GetPlayerMapPosition("Player") cast(gsi(mt)) end if plvl>=30 and fire == gsi(srt) or totemDistance() > 4 then totemX,totemY = 0,0 cast(gsi(tr)) end end end
if plvl>=78 and incom and check(st) and ((SpecialUnit() and PQ_CD==CD_BossOnly) or PQ_CD==CD_Auto) then totemX,totemY = GetPlayerMapPosition("Player") cast(gsi(st)) end if plvl>=58 and incom and check(eet) and cd(fet) > 0 and ((SpecialUnit() and PQ_CD==CD_BossOnly) or PQ_CD==CD_Auto) then totemX,totemY = GetPlayerMapPosition("Player") cast(gsi(eet)) end if plvl>=66 and incom and check(fet) and ((SpecialUnit() and PQ_CD==CD_BossOnly) or PQ_CD==CD_Auto) then totemX,totemY = GetPlayerMapPosition("Player") cast(gsi(fet)) end

Ability.Name: Interrupt
Ability.Lua: --if incom and check(gt) and cd(gsi(wsh))~=0 and Interruptable(t,gt) then -- cast(gsi(gt)) --end if plvl>=16 and incom and check(wsh) and Interruptable(t,wsh) then cast(gsi(wsh),t) end

Ability.Name: Ascendance
Ability.Lua: if plvl > 87 and check(asc) and not ubid(p,asb) and sir(gsi(ll),t)==1 and ((SpecialUnit() and PQ_CD==CD_BossOnly) or PQ_CD==CD_Auto) then cast(gsi(asc)) end

Ability.Name: Defensive
Ability.Lua: if check(sr) and plvl>=65 then cast(gsi(sr)) end if UnitRace(p)=="Draenei" and php<=80 and cd(gsi(gon))==0 then cast(gsi(gon),p) end if plvl>=30 and php<=75 and check(hst) then totemX,totemY = GetPlayerMapPosition("Player") cast(gsi(hst)) end if plvl>=7 and php<=50 and mwc==5 then cast(gsi(hs)) end if plvl>=15 and php<=30 and check(ass) then cast(gsi(ass)) end if plvl>=75 and php<=25 and cd(ag)==0 then cast(gsi(ag)) end if plvl>=60 and php<=25 and cd(fer)==0 then cast(gsi(fer)) end

Ability.Name: Racials
Ability.Lua: if check(bf) and ((SpecialUnit() and PQ_CD==CD_BossOnly) or PQ_CD==CD_Auto) then cast(gsi(bf)) end

Ability.Name: Unleash Elements
Ability.Lua: if plvl>=81 and pow>=820 and check(ue) and inMelee==true then cast(gsi(ue)) end

Ability.Name: Chain Lightning
Ability.Lua: if plvl>=28 and AOEMode~=0 and pow>=12200 and mwc==5 and check(cl) then cast(gsi(cl)) end

Ability.Name: Lava Lash
Ability.Lua: if plvl>=10 and check(ll) then if AoE==false and (sfc==5 or plvl < 34) then cast(gsi(ll)) end if AoE==true and (udbid(t,fs,p) or sfc==5) then cast(gsi(ll)) end end

Ability.Name: Fire Nova
Ability.Lua: if plvl>=20 and AOEMode~=0 and cd(fn)==0 and udbid(t,fs,p) then cast(gsi(fn)) end

Ability.Name: Unleashed Fury
Ability.Lua: if plvl>=90 and pow>=820 and check(ue) and inMelee==true and hasuf==true then cast(gsi(ue)) end

Ability.Name: SetSingle
Ability.Lua: AoE = false

Ability.Name: SetAoE
Ability.Lua: AoE = true

Ability.Name: Lightning Bolt
Ability.Lua: if AOEMode==0 and check(lb) and ((ubid(p,asc) and mwc > 1) or ((sir(gsi(ps),t)~=1 or (cd(ps)~=0 and cd(es)~=0)))) then if cd(es) > 2 and cd(fs) > 2 and cd(ll) > 2 and cd(ps) > 2 then cast(gsi(lb)) end end

Ability.Name: Earth Shock
Ability.Lua: if check(es) and plvl >= 6 then if pcasting then SpellStopCasting() else cast(gsi(es)) end end

Ability.Name: Elemental Blast
Ability.Lua: if plvl>=90 and check(eb) and inMelee==true then cast(gsi(eb)) end

Ability.Name: Elemental Mastery
Ability.Lua: if plvl>=60 and check(em) and inMelee==true and ((SpecialUnit() and PQ_CD==CD_BossOnly) or PQ_CD==CD_Auto) then cast(gsi(em)) end

Ability.Name: Lightning Bolt (5 Stacks)
Ability.Lua: if AOEMode==0 and pow>=2840 and (mwc==5 or InMelee==false) and check(lb) then cast(gsi(lb)) end

Ability.Name: Lightning Bolt (MW3 & UF DB & Asc)
Ability.Lua: if AOEMode==0 and check(lb) and udbid(t,uf,p) and ubid(p,asc) and mwc >= 3 then cast(gsi(lb)) end

Ability.Name: Ancestral Swiftness
Ability.Lua: if plvl>=60 and check(asw) and mwc < 2 then cast(gsi(asw)) end

Ability.Name: Lightning Bolt (Asw)
Ability.Lua: if AOEMode==0 and ubid(p,asw) and check(lb) then cast(gsi(lb)) end

Ability.Name: Feral Spirit
Ability.Lua: if plvl>=60 and cd(fer)==0 and ((SpecialUnit() and PQ_CD==CD_BossOnly) or PQ_CD==CD_Auto) then cast(gsi(fer)) end

Ability.Name: Spiritwalkers Grace
Ability.Lua: if plvl>=85 and check(sg) and PQR_IsMoving(1) and incom then cast(gsi(sg)) end

Ability.Name: Stormblast
Ability.Lua: if ubid(p,asb) and cd(sb)==0 then cast(gsi(sb),t) end

Ability.Name: Stormstrike
Ability.Lua: if plvl < 26 and check(ps) then if pcasting then SpellStopCasting() else cast(gsi(ps)) end end if plvl>=26 and pow>=3760 and check(ss) and not ubid(p,asb) then cast(gsi(ss),t) end if ubid(p,asb) and check(sb) then cast(gsi(sb),t) end

Ability.Name: Flame Shock (Unleashed Flame)
Ability.Lua: if plvl>=12 and pow>=1190 and check(fs) and ubid(p,ufl) and fsr < 7 then cast(gsi(fs)) end

Ability.Name: Flame Shock (Flame Shock Debuff)
Ability.Lua: if plvl>=12 and check(fs) and not udbid(t,fs,p) then if pcasting then SpellStopCasting() else cast(gsi(fs)) end end

Ability.Name: Ghost Wolf
Ability.Lua: if plvl>=15 and sir(gsi(ll),t)~=1 and not ubid(p,gw) and not ubid(p,asc) and PQR_IsMoving(1) and cd(sg) > 0 and not ubid(p,sg) and not IsMounted() then cast(gsi(gw)) end if plvl>=15 and sir(gsi(ll),t)==1 and ubid(p,gw) then RunMacroText("/cancelform") end

Ability.Name: Lightning Bolt (Spiritwalk)
Ability.Lua: if AOEMode==0 and incom and ubid(p,sg) and check(lb) and sir(gsi(ll),t)~=1 then cast(gsi(lb)) end

Ability.Name: Profession
Ability.Lua: if incom and ((SpecialUnit() and PQ_CD==CD_BossOnly) or PQ_CD==CD_Auto) and sir(gsi(ss),t)==1 then --Synapse Springs if GetInventoryItemCooldown(p,10) == 0 then UseInventoryItem(10) end if GetInventoryItemCooldown(p,6) == 0 then UseInventoryItem(6) end end
